entry.title: 120V Flexible LED Neon Light - Single Side Lighted - Cool White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 139.90 - 239.90 (2 variants)

The White color is the whitest white available, and is similar to the color of snow. The Pure White color is the brightest Neon color available and will bring the amazing look and feel of Neon to any location. 

The sealed and waterproof design is rated to IP67 and is ready for the toughest outdoor applications including: Outdoor Commercial Lighting, Hospitality Lighting, Architectural Lighting, Landscape Lighting and Deck/Patio Lighting. 

Features:

  • Ultrabight LEDs  200 Lumens/Meter  ( 61 Lumens/ft ).
  • Highly Flexible
  • Cut Points Every 19.69" (50 cm)
  • Waterproof design great for Indoor and Outdoor projects
  • Low Heat Output
  • Extra Long Life: 50,000 Hours+
  • Easy Installation: 110V no need for transformer.
  • Low Maintenance Costs: 4.4 Watts/Meter (1.33W/ft)
  • ETL (US and Canada) Certified LED Neon Light

entry.title: Flexible LED Neon Light - Single Side Lighted - Warm White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 139.90 - 239.90 (2 variants)

The Warm White LED Neon light is the softest white available, and is similar to the color of an incandescent light bulb. The Warm White color will bring the amazing look and feel of Neon to any location and is perfect for adding to locations with existing incandescent lighting. 

Product Applications

Suitable for sign writing, building outlines, feature lighting, bars, clubs, hotels, theatre, display cabinets, architectural and more.

Features:

  • Ultrabight LEDs  200 Lumens/Meter  ( 61 Lumens/ft ).
  • Highly Flexible
  • Unique PVC Single Jacket Design
  • Low Heat Output
  • Extra Long Life: 50,000 Hours+
  • Easy Installation: 110V no need for transformer.
  • Low Maintenance Costs: 4.4 Watts/Meter (1.33W/ft)
  • ETL (US and Canada) Certified LED Neon Light

entry.title: 120V Flexible LED Neon Light - Double Side Lighted - White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 159.90 - 279.90 (2 variants)

The 6000K White Neon LED Strip Light creates the stunning look and feel of eye-catching Neon lights using energy saving LED lights. No more expensive and dangerous high voltage lighting required to enjoy the amazing colors from Neon lights. Neon LED Strip Light is safer, flexible and more affordable, and comes in lengths as short as 19.69" and up to 165 continuous feet all on one plug. 

Suitable for sign writing, building outlines, feature lighting, bars, clubs, hotels, theater, display cabinets, architectural and more.

Features:

  • 120V Driverless: No High Voltage Transformers Needed
  • Comes Ready to Plug In: Installs In Seconds
  • Up to 165 Continuous Feet with Just One Plug
  • High Grade Waterproof Silicone Housing for Added Protection (IP67 Rating)
  • Great for Indoor and Outdoor Projects
  • Cut Points Every 19.69" (50 cm)

entry.title: 120V Flexible LED Neon Light - Double Side Lighted - Warm White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 159.90 - 279.90 (2 variants)

3000K Warm White double side lighted LED Neon Flex Light: A combination of emerging LED technology along with innovative opaque PVC tubing gives LED Neon its ability to mimic the uniformity and brightness of light produced by traditional glass neon at a fraction of the price.

Outdoor Rated suitable for both indoor and outdoor applications.

Product Applications

Suitable for sign writing, building outlines, feature lighting, bars, clubs, hotels, theater, display cabinets, architectural and more.

Features:

  • Ultrabight LEDs  200 Lumens/Meter.
  • Highly Flexible
  • Unique PVC Single Jacket Design
  • Low Heat Output
  • Extra Long Life: 50,000 Hours+
  • Easy Installation: Plug In Directly to Any AC Outlet 110V Driverless: No need for transformer.
  • Low Maintenance Costs: 4.8 Watts/Meter (1.5W/ft)
  • ETL (US and Canada) Certified LED Neon Light

entry.title: Flexible LED Neon Light - Single Side Lighted - Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 139.90 - 239.90 (2 variants)

Single Side 120V Blue LED Neon Light  is the next generation in linear lighting design. This economical alternative to standard neon lighting will provide you with an easy to customize, highly versatile, extremely durable solution for your next lighting project.

Product Applications

Suitable for sign writing, building outlines, feature lighting, bars, clubs, hotels, theatre, display cabinets, architectural and more.

Features:

  • Ultrabight LEDs  200 Lumens/Meter  ( 61 Lumens/ft )
  • Low Maintenance Costs: 4.4 Watts/Meter (1.33W/ft)
  • Easy Installation: 110V no need for transformer
  • Highly Flexible
  • Minimum cut length: 50cm (1.64ft)
  • Transverse minimum bending radius: 4cm (1.6in)
  • Outdoor rated for both indoor and outdoor applications
  • Low Heat Output
  • Extra Long Life: 50,000 Hours+
  • ETL (US and Canada) Certified for builders and contractors

entry.title: 120V Flexible LED Neon Light - Double Side Lighted - Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 159.90 - 279.90 (2 variants)

Blue Color Double Sided Neon Light consist of LEDs encased within a PVC protective casing which is molded into a patented shape. This shape allows for the even disbursement of light and produces a consistent light effect like that of traditional glass neon fixtures.

Product Applications

Suitable for sign writing, building outlines, feature lighting, bars, clubs, hotels, theater, display cabinets, architectural and more.

Features:

  • Ultrabight LEDs  200 Lumens/Meter  ( 61 Lumens/ft )
  • Low Maintenance Costs: 4.4 Watts/Meter (1.33W/ft)
  • Easy Installation: 110V no need for transformer
  • Highly Flexible
  • Minimum cut length: 50cm (1.64ft)
  • Transverse minimum bending radius: 4cm (1.6in)
  • Outdoor rated for both indoor and outdoor applications
  • Low Heat Output
